thread.title: Lycoming County Upgrades to Infolinx WEB 3.4
thread.title_full: Lycoming County Upgrades to Infolinx WEB 3.4 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Lycoming County Upgrades to Infolinx WEB 3.4
text:
Infolinx Solution continues to enhance management of county records
Kensington, MD
Infolinx System Solutions, a leading provider of enterprise physical records management software, announced an upgrade to the latest Infolinx WEB, version 3.4 for Lycoming County, Pennsylvania. A long-term client, Lycoming has been using Infolinx since 2004 to manage records housed within the county records center. Architected to include the integration of hundreds of retention schedules, Lycoming utilizes Infolinx to manage the accession of records from more than thirty county departments as well as their eventual timely disposition.
While facilitating the implementation of a contemporary technology stack including the latest server operating systems and SQL Server versions, the upgrade also involved migrating from the legacy Infolinx SE thick-client software to the true thin-client Infolinx WEB.
In addition to deepened integrations with solutions such as Microsoft SharePoint®, Laserfiche® Records Manager, Kofax® Capture, Iron Mountain Connect, and oneilBridge, the Infolinx WEB 3.4 application boasts a completely redesigned, browser agnostic application interface, expanded records request capability, improved reporting functionality, and an extended security model.
“We appreciate all of our clients, but especially those who have been with us for the long haul”, said Tim Butler, Infolinx Managing Director. “We look forward to another decade of providing Lycoming County with the same high level of customer service.”
About Infolinx®
Infolinx System Solutions is a leading provider of DoD5015.2-certified enterprise physical records management software. Full life-cycle records management for archives, records centers, and file rooms includes integrated Enterprise Content Management, third-party warehouse integration, robust searching, online requesting, complete audit history, location reconciliation, supply item ordering, retention schedule and legal holds management, integrated RFID technology, space management with charge-back functionality, extensive reporting capability, advanced security configuration, workflow email notifications, and legacy data sharing. Available as an on-premises or cloud-based solution, Infolinx maintains clients within all major business segments and the public sector. Infolinx System Solutions Demo.
